# Animal (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Aerdrie Faenya]], [[Baervan Wildwanderer]], [[Beory]], [[Bralm]], [[Breeka]], [[Camazotz]] \[also known as Zotzilaha or Zotz], [[Damaran]], [[Deep Sashelas]], [[Eadro]], [[Ehlonna]] \[Ehlenestra to elves], [[Fenmarel Mestarine]], [[Gadhelyn]], [[Hiatea]], [[Karontor]], [[Llerg]], [[Meyanok]], [[Obad-Hai]], [[Phaulkon]], [[Procan]], [[Quetzalcoatl]], [[Raxivort]], Segojan Earthcaller, Semuanya, Skerrit, Solonor Thelandira, Tlazoteotl, [[Vatun]], Wastri, Xerbo, Yondalla |

**Granted Powers:** You can speak with and befriend animals with ease. In addition, you treat [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (nature) as a class skill.

- *[[Speak with Animals (Spell)|Speak with Animals]]** (Sp):* You can speak with animals, as per the spell, for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your cleric level.
- *Animal Companion (Ex):* At 4th level, you gain the service of an animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your cleric level –3. (Druids who take this ability through their nature bond class feature use their druid level –3 to determine the abilities of their animal companions).

**Animal Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Calm Animals (Spell)|Calm Animals]]****:** Calms 2d4 + level HD of animals.

**2** **[[Hold Animal (Spell)|Hold Animal]]****:** Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.

**3** **[[Dominate Animal (Spell)|Dominate Animal]]****:** One animal obeys your silent mental commands and orders.

**4** **[[Summon Nature's Ally IV (Spell)|Summon Nature’s Ally IV]]** (animals only)**:** Summons creature to fight.

**5** **[[Beast Shape III (Spell)|Beast Shape III]]** (animals only): You take the form of a Diminutive or Huge animal, or Small or Medium magical beast.

**6** **[[Antilife Shell (Spell)|Antilife Shell]]****:** 10-ft.-radius field hedges out living creatures.

**7** **[[Animal Shapes (Spell)|Animal Shapes]]****:** One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

**8** **[[Summon Nature's Ally VIII (Spell)|Summon Nature’s Ally VIII]]** (animals only)**:** Summons creature to fight.

**9** **[[Shapechange (Spell)|Shapechange]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Transforms you into certain creatures, and you can change forms once per round.
